about_the_game:
Suit up with Dally's mighty Catastrophe Armor and crush the competition! This DLC unlocks Dally for use in-game as a fully playable character a full suite of unique weapons.

Dally's 15 unique rapidfire Weapons restore NRG quickly for use with her versatile toolkit of 9 unique Powers while charging up toward one of her 8 new devastating Supers. Combined with her special Mod Bell upgrades, her arsenal is 30XX's most diverse toolkit yet!

Dally Features:
- 15 new Primary Weapons, 9 new Powers, and 8 new Supers (powerful finisher Powers!)
- High NRG restore mechanics - Dally's weapons each have higher NRG restore than Nina's do, allowing her toolkit to be used freely
- Unique Charge mechanics - Dally's weapons cannot be charged! Instead, attack hits Charge up her mighty Supers, and effects that impact Charging affect these instead
- Brilliant Bells: Instead of normal Character Augs, Dally finds Bells -- upgrade items that can be applied to *any* of her abilities (Weapons, Powers, or Supers) -- to boost their effects! Attach the Homing Bell to grant any of your other ability projectiles homing properties, the Bell of Novae to make any ability fire more projectiles in random directions, or the Zealous Bell to make them fire faster!
- Between the 11 upgrade Bells, 15 Weapons, and 17 Powers (8 Supers, 9 Normal) Dally has access to, her loadout variance is near-limitless.
detailed_description:
Suit up with Dally's mighty Catastrophe Armor and crush the competition! This DLC unlocks Dally for use in-game as a fully playable character a full suite of unique weapons.

Dally's 15 unique rapidfire Weapons restore NRG quickly for use with her versatile toolkit of 9 unique Powers while charging up toward one of her 8 new devastating Supers. Combined with her special Mod Bell upgrades, her arsenal is 30XX's most diverse toolkit yet!

Dally Features:
- 15 new Primary Weapons, 9 new Powers, and 8 new Supers (powerful finisher Powers!)
- High NRG restore mechanics - Dally's weapons each have higher NRG restore than Nina's do, allowing her toolkit to be used freely
- Unique Charge mechanics - Dally's weapons cannot be charged! Instead, attack hits Charge up her mighty Supers, and effects that impact Charging affect these instead
- Brilliant Bells: Instead of normal Character Augs, Dally finds Bells -- upgrade items that can be applied to *any* of her abilities (Weapons, Powers, or Supers) -- to boost their effects! Attach the Homing Bell to grant any of your other ability projectiles homing properties, the Bell of Novae to make any ability fire more projectiles in random directions, or the Zealous Bell to make them fire faster!
- Between the 11 upgrade Bells, 15 Weapons, and 17 Powers (8 Supers, 9 Normal) Dally has access to, her loadout variance is near-limitless.

name: 30XX - Feline Fury DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dally's mighty Catastrophe Armor crushes the competition! Master 32 new weapons & powers alongside Dally's unique Charge mode, and build devastating Supers.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
